summary: Harvest Rewards & Campaigns API testing complete. All 24 backend tests passed (100%). All 10 specified endpoints verified working correctly: rewards catalog with user points and can_redeem status, campaign management with templates, streak tracking with multipliers, challenge system, and badge tiers (common/rare/epic/legendary).
critical_code_review_comments: All Harvest Rewards & Campaigns API endpoints properly protected with authentication (returns 401/403 for unauthorized requests)
Rewards are correctly sorted by points_required ascending
User points are consistent across /rewards and /progress/rewards endpoints (376 points)
can_redeem and points_needed fields correctly calculated based on user's current points
5 campaign templates properly seeded: Weekly Blitz, Season Long Ladder, New Rep Sprint, Storm Response, Team Battle
Streak multiplier logic correctly implemented: 1.0x (<3 days), 1.1x (3+), 1.25x (5+), 1.5x (10+), 2.0x (30+)
Badge tiers properly organized: common (12), rare (2), epic (1), legendary (1)
Redemption endpoint correctly returns 400 with 'Insufficient points' message when user lacks points
All goal_types valid: doors, appointments, contracts, points, custom
All reward_types valid: top_performers, threshold, lottery
seed_data_creation: Test reward created during admin test (TEST_Reward_1269ba4d) - should be cleaned up
context_for_next_testing_agent: Harvest Rewards & Campaigns APIs fully functional. User test@eden.com has 376 points. 4 rewards exist (500, 1000, 2000, 5000 points). 5 campaign templates seeded. User has 1 badge earned (Ten Doors Down). Current streak: 1 day with 1.0x multiplier. No active campaigns or challenges. Redemption history empty.

GET /api/harvest/rewards.details: Returns rewards list with user_points (376), can_redeem status, points_needed, and categories

POST /api/harvest/rewards.details: Admin can create rewards, returns id and success message

GET /api/harvest/campaigns.details: Returns campaigns list with progress, time_remaining, participant_count, leader info

GET /api/harvest/campaigns/templates/lis.details: Returns 5 default templates: Weekly Blitz, Season Long Ladder, New Rep Sprint, Storm Response, Team Battle

GET /api/harvest/streak.details: Returns current_streak (1), best_streak (1), multiplier (1.0), has_activity_today (true), doors_today (19)

GET /api/harvest/challenges.details: Returns user's active challenges (empty list currently)

GET /api/harvest/badges/tiers.details: Returns badges organized by tier: common (12), rare (2), epic (1), legendary (1). User earned 1/16 badges

GET /api/harvest/progress/rewards.details: Returns current_points (376), rewards_progress with percent_complete, next_reward info

POST /api/harvest/rewards/redeem.details: Returns 400 with 'Insufficient points. Need X, have Y' when user lacks points
